page.title: 06 Education
page.content: Bitterley C.E. (Aided) Primary School, Governor's Meeting,10th. July 1985. Extracts from {Headmasters Report: {Number On Role.}61 full time children. {Staffing}(School).The present allocation of staff to Bitterley School is 3.4 and is to remain at that level for another year.Mrs. King continues full time in the infant section and in September will be joined by the Head (Mr. M.D. Livingston) during Monday morning sessions and by Mrs. Kemp during Monday afternoon sessions, for group work and remedial support.Mrs. Griffiths continues full time in the lower juniors and will be joined by the Head on Tuesday morning sessions. Mrs. Kemp(0.4) will take the upper juniors Monday and Tuesday mornings for maths and English.
